choices: This story sucks. I want a new one.
1.content:
This story will be somewhat like an AU (Alternate Universe) where you follow frisk as they travel through the underground, or the first fallen human Chara and see how they lived there life with the Dreemurr family.

Either route you chose, the key difference here is that they will be a lot taller than there canon counterparts. They will also be thirteen for context of age.

Now chose who to follow (and there gender) and we can get this story started.
1.title: The fallen (and giant) human.

11.content: Okay, now you can chose which “morality path” you wish to take.
11.title: Giant Frisk

12.content: Okay, now you can chose which “morality path” you wish to take.
12.title: Giantess Frisk

121.content:
Mt.Ebott, the place where all monsters have been banished to its underground depths, and sealed by a magic barrier, preventing there "escape". It has stayed that way for many years, with only a handful of humans ever climbing the mountain.

And never returning.

But I'm sure you already knew that little backstory, so lets continue onwards at the entrance of the underground, where we meet a lonely talking flower named, Flowey. And here we se him... Talking to himself?

"Ahhh, It doesn't get better than this. A dark dank underground cave fit for a flower like me, where I can construct my next act of mischief, and evil doing." Flowey monologues to himself. The dark room fills with a few seconds of silence, before Flowey continues to talk to the very air around him. "Oh, who am I kidding? This place is BORING! I basically have the power to turn back time whenever I please, and I can't do a DAMN THING with it. Sure, I can just take the human souls from the old man, but that walking trash bag isn't as lazy as he lets on to be, and is keeping me from the very things that will make me A GOD. Now i'm just stuck in some kind of purgatory."

Being all alone, with barely anyone to talk to, and stuck in the underground what feels like forever to him, has put a toll on the flowers mental state.

"AND YOU, DR. NEEDLES, HOW ABOUT YOU STOP JUST STANDIND THERE, AND START GIVING ME SOME IDEAS!? I AM AT! MY! LIMIT!" Flowy yells at a potted cactus, witch falls over in response. (Somehow?)

...

"Okay, Its official, I've been down in this waste dump for far too long..."

"AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA " *THUMP*

"What?" Flowey exclaimed. Just In the room with bed of goldenrod flowers, he heard what seemed to be a girl screaming and falling. It had been a long time he had heard something similar. Could this be... Another fallen human?

"I 'HAVE' been down here for a long time, but not much longer. Hee hee hee hee hee..."
121.title: Prolouge

choices: Down right evil. (But not to obvious)

15.content:
WHAT?!

We literally just started!

And now you want a new one!?

You might as well chose one of the other stories on this site, cause I'm not changing a thing!

(FYI, this chapter serves no purpose. I'm also very lazy.)
15.title: This story sucks. I want a new one.

info.brief_description: The last (and first) human that falls into the underground is a lot taller than normal.
info.description: Just one rule, only Frisk and Chara can be the giants/giantess. They can also grow, preferably not to fast. (And frisk can talk to, if you want them to.) Other than that, go nuts.
